class.name: FilePane
class.javadoc:
WARNING: This class is an implementation detail and is only public so that it can be used by two packages. You should NOT consider this public API.

This component is intended to be used in a subclass of javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicFileChooserUI. It realies heavily on the implementation of BasicFileChooserUI, and is intended to be API compatible with earlier implementations of MetalFileChooserUI and WindowsFileChooserUI. Leif Samuelsson

anonymous_class.javadoc: Moves the keyboard focus to the first element whose prefix matches the sequence of alphanumeric keys pressed by the user with delay less than value of timeFactor. Subsequent same key presses move the keyboard focus to the next object that starts with the same letter until another key is pressed, then it is treated as the prefix with appropriate number of the same letters followed by first typed another letter.

class.javadoc:
Fetches the command list for the FilePane. These commands are useful for binding to events, such as in a keymap.
the command list

class.name: SortableListModel
class.javadoc: This model allows for sorting JList

class.name: DirectoriesFirstComparatorWrapper
class.javadoc: This class sorts directories before files, comparing directory to directory and file to file using the wrapped comparator.
Creates a selection listener for the list of files and directories. a ListSelectionListener
@param index visual index of the file to be edited
Property to remember whether a directory is currently selected in the UI. true iff a directory is currently selected.
Property to remember the directory that is currently selected in the UI. the value of the directory property javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicFileChooserUI#setDirectory
Returns true if specified FileChooser should use ShellFolder
